DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine which surgical approach is better for treatment of tibial shaft fracture
DOC.brief_title: Study of Tibial Shaft Fracture Fixation: Intramedullary Nailing Comparing With Dynamic Compression Plate
DOC.detailed_description: Tibial fracture is more common fracture. We aimed to compare unreamed intramedullary nailing (UTN) and dynamic compression plate (DCP) with regard to fracture healing and complications in patients with closed tibial shaft fractures.
DOC.criteria: patient with tibial shaft fracture nothing
